mapper.insert: insert into notice(notice_code, author_id, author_password, title, content, views, file_root, file_size, upload_date) values(#{notice_code}, #{author_id}, #{author_password}, #{title}, #{content},#{views}, #{file_root}, #{file_size},NOW() )
mapper.update: update notice set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, file_root = #{file_root}, file_size = #{file_size} where notice_code = #{notice_code}
mapper.select: select notice_code, author_id, author_password, title, content, views, file_root, file_size, upload_date from notice where notice_code = #{notice_code}
select notice_code, author_id, author_password, title, content, views, file_root, file_size, upload_date from notice
